task.summary: Default task
Sketch java classes for the detection algorithm.
Add DataLine to model data extracted from each line in the VCF file.
Add test-data with as sample VCF.
Preliminary work for reading the input VCF file.
Refactor VCFReader to use fields instead of columns. Remove DataLine class.
Assign position codes to Samples. Position codes allow to reduce the information to keep in the sorted list by mapping a pair <chromosome, absolute-position> into a single value.
Map patient information with an index. Again, the goal is to save as much space as possible in the global sorted list.
Fix access modifiers in PositionCodeCalculator.
Add getName method to Sample.
Rename PatientInfoMap to PatientInfoIndexer.
Several fixes and improvements to VCF Reader. Remove the position code from samples. Add test for checking the integrity of the data read from the VCF file.
Add JSAP interface and a related test.
Print also the sample name in Sample.toString.
Make Node class local to the package.
Fix forward and backward iterators. Add shuffle operation to DoublyLinkedList.
Add sorting capabilities to DoublyLinkedList. Create base SampleComparator to wrap Node comparators.
Rename data package to list. Move SampleComparator to input package.
Add logic to PriorityScoreComparator. More comments in the code.
Add iterator to navigate the DoublyLinked list following the natural order of its elements.
Add reverse operation to DoublyLinkedList.
Implement Iterable interface in DoublyLinkedList.
Preliminary work on cluster detection.
Preliminary work on output formatters.
Add output-file option to the interface.
Manage the order of the stop conditions applied to cluster detection.
Add dependency to fastutil v.6.5.11. Use ObjectArrayList instead of List in DoublyLinkedList. Improve unit test for DoublyLinked list to test expected values/exception.
Remove exceptions from some test cases.
Model the output cluster queue.
Define the cluster comparator to use in the output queue.
Rename QualityScore to Rank.
Rename ClusterTooBig to Size.
Preliminary work on cluster detection.
Implement getMessage in BaseStopCondition.
Improve interface, creation and order management for Stop Conditions.
Implement Size stop condition.
Add StopConditions to Cluster.
Add watcher to create output statistics on the detector execution.
More work on cluster detection.
Manage relevant flag in a cluster. A relevant cluster is included in the output list.
Improve relevant clusters detection. Now it's up to the stop condition to determine when a cluster is relevant or not.
Keep the current rank in the Cluster instance, avoiding to recalculate it at each iteration.
Add Rank as stop condition to ClusterDetector. Print the cluster rank in the output record.
Add concept of degree of proximity when extending a cluster.
Rename Sample to Site.
Exclude sites with a negative priority score.
Fix Size stop condition.
Add stop condition metadata to the output list.
Manage output to file.
Add degree of proximity to the output metadata.
Add number of sites analyzed to the output metadata.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add number of sites analyzed to the output metadata.
